code: import axios from"axios";var baseUrl="https://obscure-harbor-55907.herokuapp.com/api/notes";var getAll=function getAll(){var request=axios.get(baseUrl);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var create=function create(newObject){var request=axios.post(baseUrl,newObject);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var update=function update(id,newObject){var request=axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newObject);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var noteService={getAll:getAll,create:create,update:update};export default noteService;
